## Description and Rationale

I am a data scientist with experience building models and analytics using movement data, including aircraft trajectories. I have been interested in aviation and flight data for some time, and am excited to leverage some of my past work to compete in this challenge.

## Details

* Type: Independent
* Country: United States

library(gt)
